item.title: Computer Vision using Azure Cognitive Services
item.description: As part of my effort to learn more about artificial intelligence, machine learning, and Azure, I have been reading Deep Learning with Azure. Having just finished Part II: Azure AI Platform and Experimentation Tools, I thought I might write up my experiences working with computer vision and custom vision while they are still fresh in my mind. Despite the majority of my professional programming experience being in C#, I decided to use Python to work through the examples.
